contents:
转自连登，有大陆社交账号的，让“饭圈女孩”帮忙“揽炒” 起来！

[文宣] 有鬼佬幫手整合左一路以黎跪低比人民幣 比Chinazi打壓言論自由既紀錄
https://lihkg.com/thread/1643602/page/2

除左最近既爐石 , NBA , 蘋果 , Google , Vans之外

ESPN (迪士尼擁有,美國最大體育頻道) 禁止賽評討論NBA香港事件 : https://deadspin.com/internal-memo-espn-forbids-discussion-of-chinese-polit-1838881032

Paramount (電影公司) 整走左Tom Cruise Top Gun續集電影入面jacket上面既台灣旗 :https://www.cnbc.com/2019/07/19/tom-cruises-top-gun-jacket-shows-how-key-china-is-to-film-industry.html

Marvel (迪士尼) : 將古一由西藏高僧改成白人女人 https://www.nbcnews.com/news/asian-america/tibet-supporters-protest-marvel-s-dr-strange-over-changed-character-n677706

ASICS, Calvin Klein, Coach, Fresh, Givenchy, Pocari Sweat, Valentino, Versace, Swarovski 全跪: https://www.whatsonweibo.com/these-are-the-foreign-brands-apologizing-to-china-amid-hong-kong-tensions/

萬豪酒店 , 將TAIWAN改做TAIWAN,CHINA : https://www.scmp.com/news/china/policies-politics/article/2160030/taiwan-hotel-cuts-ties-marriott-protest-caving-beijing

Nike : 下架所有火箭隊產品 https://fadeawayworld.net/2019/10/08/nike-removes-all-houston-rockets-related-products-from-their-china-webstore/

暴雪AGAIN , 比賽未完 CUT走舉香港標語既賽事 : https://streamable.com/vrlcc

蘋果AGAIN , 向中共提供國內用戶icloud數據及密碼 https://www.theverge.com/2018/7/18/17587304/apple-icloud-china-user-data-state-run-telecom-privacy-security

蘋果AGAIN, 隱瞞被中共利用黎監控東突維族人既系統漏洞 https://www.theverge.com/2019/9/6/20853393/apple-iphone-ios-exploits-statement-security-google-false-impressions

國泰炒人 https://www.theguardian.com/world/2019/aug/28/cathay-pacific-denounced-for-firing-hong-kong-staff-on-china-orders

TIFFANY 遮眼廣告下架 https://news.yahoo.com/tiffany-removes-advert-over-hong-kong-controversy-093418861.html

萬豪酒店AGAIN 員工LIKE左西藏獨立既TWEET被炒 https://www.scmp.com/news/china/society/article/2128124/marriott-sacks-employee-who-liked-twitter-post-tibet-independence

MERCEDES BENZ 因為用左達賴喇嘛既QUOTE而被炒 : https://www.telegraph.co.uk/news/2018/02/07/mercedes-apologises-china-quoting-dalai-lama/

美國航空, DELTA ,聯航 台灣country跪低 https://www.businessinsider.com/which-companies-have-changed-taiwan-description-china-2018-7
